name: SPOTTED (koro.games)
description:
Testing Logs:

Test No. 101

The robot gained independence.
Oh, what's that ?! It wants to run away!
Are we all going to be... SPOTTED?

Game made for Ludum Dare#46 in 72 hours

Controls:
WASD to move
E to on/off hand
Left Mouse Button to grab
Right Mouse Button to use
